column2: "The number one ARKS information dealer; Patty here!"

"Do you know about the amazing
ARKS? What's amazing about them?
Pretty much everything!"
"To translate, she's talking about the ARKS known as the Council of Six, ARKS members who hold the highest authority."
"Yeah those guys! Turns out I met one of them in person!"

"It was like Ka-boom! And then
Ka-bam! Anyways, just really
amazing!"
"Even through she saw it, it was from far away, so don't take her too seriously."
"But the fact that they're very strong is not information to be taken lightly."
"But it's really amazing, she just looks like a normal little girl!"
"I wonder if I can become like that if I try?"
